name: Meteor Mayhem (itch)
description:
Welcome aboard Cadet! Your primary objective is to pilot a cruiser and avoid crashing into meteors, asteroids and other types of space debris as you traverse and explore the galaxy! On your journey you will experience beautiful worlds and environments to clear out space debris and possibly encounter alien threats that mean you harm.

  

Meteor Mayhem is played in a Wave-based style. After passing a specific amount of debris successfully you will proceed to the next route and slowly pick up speed.

Points are rewarded for successfully avoiding and/or destroying debris on your route. After Completing a Route, the points are added to your grand total to be able to purchase unlockables located in the Cruiser Hanger or In-game Pitstop!

Meteor Mayhem also offers Bonus Content by accessing the Code Menu in the Hanger. There you can enter in codes that will be release in Events and Giveaways via our Discord and other Zerconium platforms/media.

Good Luck!
